IShader.h

This file defines the published interface for a shader.

IShader

Defines the public interface for using CShader

Functions

virtual std::wstring &Name() = 0
Returns

Name of shader

BeginRender
virtual void BeginRender(
IGraphics *pGraphics,
IRenderMaterial *pFrontMaterial,
IRenderMaterial *pBackMaterial,
std::vector<CRefObj<IPointLight>> &lights,
DirectX::XMMATRIX *pWorld
) = 0

Starts rendering.

Parameters

IGraphics*

graphics device

pFrontMaterial
IRenderMaterial*

material to use for front faces

pBackMaterial
IRenderMaterial*

material to use for back faces

lights
std::vector<CRefObj<IPointLight>>&

list of lights to use

pWorld
DirectX::XMMATRIX*

matrix to apply

EndRender
virtual void EndRender(
IGraphics *pGraphics
) = 0
